page.title: 05Matchborough Centre.
page.content: The centre is {14 years old, }it comprises {8 shops}including a {Post {office}which first opened in a caravan. The shops include a {newsagent,greengrocer,hardware {store,supermarket,fish and chip {shop,video and betting shop.}There is also a{hairdressers,a bank and public {house}called The Sticky Wicket.The centre is provided with{lavatories,a {post box,two telephone kiosks,and two {car parks.}In close proximity to the centre are the{Friends Meeting Rooms} used by {Quakers}and also by the {Social Services}for a{day nursery.A {church}was built in{1973}known as the{ {local Ecumenical Project}combining{ {Methodists and Anglicans. }The church also provides a playgroup,tap,ballet and modern dance classes,and some discos.{The Pathfinders}are a group attached to the church meeting on a
